Class InstanceGraphAccumulator

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.enterprise.repositoryconnector.accumulators.ExceptionAccumulatorBase
org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.enterprise.repositoryconnector.accumulators.QueryAccumulatorBase
org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.enterprise.repositoryconnector.accumulators.InstanceGraphAccumulator
public class InstanceGraphAccumulator extends QueryAccumulatorBase
InstanceGraphAccumulator provides the accumulator for an instance graph - this is a collection of related entities and relationships.
